Articles.Content:
Presumably the experience from a air force for a country wouldn't transfer to the tanks?

Would they decrease the level requirements for countries then? Or would you just get people specialising in one area.

Tanks would be nice, now I can have a cup of tea with the in-built kettle in the British tanks

Edited May 29, 2013 by LeonG17
British tanks may not be the best but they are my favourite. Same with the planes.

And we apply that logic to everything else

My main nation is Britain, just onto lv3. A twelve machine gun hurricane is fun.

And we apply that logic to everything else

My main nation is Britain, just onto lv3. A twelve machine gun hurricane is fun.

Only level 3? Or have you only just started? I am level 7 on Britain I think. And level 3 on most of the others. Just wait till you get cannons.
Yeah, only got it yesterday. I've done 2 single missions as well, Eagle day was fun and I tried cannons flying a Fw 190 in the other single mission.
Not bad. Also off topic of this thread. Anyone been getting 500 errors and having to refresh in the last 30 seconds?

Just got one a few seconds ago.

On topic: Fighting bombers are fun Its just fun to see the engines explode and the fuselage to fall away and hit the ground.

Just got one a few seconds ago.

On topic: Fighting bombers are fun Its just fun to see the engines explode and the fuselage to fall away and hit the ground.

Haha yeah. I usually use rockets on bombers for fun because they aren't doing barrel rolls every 5 seconds making them a stable target.

Haha yeah. I usually use rockets on bombers for fun because they aren't doing barrel rolls every 5 seconds making them a stable target.

I'm still trying to learn how to fight them, I stay on their six stupidly but I find it hard to attack through other ways. And I've shoot down a few enemy players who were on my six in my Blenheim.

I'm still trying to learn how to fight them, I stay on their six stupidly but I find it hard to attack through other ways. And I've shoot down a few enemy players who were on my six in my Blenheim.

It's best to come at them from an angle in which their back gunner cannot fire. The side is good. Also just lower than it is good too.

Another quick thing. I haven't done this yet.

Username: KD3

Favourite aircraft: Spitfire

EDIT: Turns out I was wrong from an old post and I am only level 5 on British. I thought I was higher for some reason.

Edited May 29, 2013 by KD3

Seems I was reading my charts wrong as well. My correct levels are as follows: Overall 4, America 1, Germany 3, Russia 0, Britian 0, Japan 1.

Not bad. Also off topic of this thread. Anyone been getting 500 errors and having to refresh in the last 30 seconds?

There seems to be a problem with the server. It's already been called in up the line, just be patient while they figure out what is happening to it.

Seems I was reading my charts wrong as well. My correct levels are as follows: Overall 4, America 1, Germany 3, Russia 0, Britian 0, Japan 1.

There seems to be a problem with the server. It's already been called in up the line, just be patient while they figure out what is happening to it.

Yeah, I think those errors in Enigma was that as well. What might be the issue?

Wonder what the next off-topic thread will be... *ponders name*

On-topic: I'm only at lv 3 British with about 2500 experience for Germany and that's it.

Wonder what the next off-topic thread will be... *ponders name*

On-topic: I'm only at lv 3 British with about 2500 experience for Germany and that's it.

It's not locked permanently. Oh and I have no idea what this game is.

Here's the homepage: http://warthunder.com/en/

Its a WW2 vehicular simulator, currently only aircraft where you go on missions-historical or arcade ones and do the objectives. You level up in profile and countrys and can unlock new plane and modify them.

Dammit, Chobit. I don't play MMOs... but this sounds kinda fun...

*is waiting for it to finish setup...*

Now chobit can kill you in another virtual world

Have fun waiting for it to all load.

Currently in-game right now with a squad started.

I'm hoping to get chobit to join it for some proper flying lessons, now that I've got a plane that might actually be able to keep up.

Now chobit can kill you in another virtual world

Have fun waiting for it to all load.

Oh, Chobit doesn't dare kill me. For several reasons.

I was planning to play Minecraft while it all loaded. That was a big ol'NOPE.

It speeds up if you don't go on the internet...

Why wouldn't chobit kill you?

It speeds up if you don't go on the internet...

Why wouldn't chobit kill you?

She commands the Tolberone, obviously.

Currently in-game right now with a squad started.

I'm hoping to get chobit to join it for some proper flying lessons, now that I've got a plane that might actually be able to keep up.

What plane is that?

What plane is that?

Junkers Ju87 B-2.

I've got mine set up with both bombs and a gunrack upgrade. It's fast enough to not be a sitting duck, and has enough bang to actually inflict some serious damage. Took out two heavy tanks back to back with it a few matches ago.
Can't imagine it would be that good against fighters- it always was the weakness of them. How do you fight the fighters?

Can't imagine it would be that good against fighters- it always was the weakness of them. How do you fight the fighters?

I turn tail and get out of there is how. Repairs aren't cheap.

Though I have hit a few fighters with it, I'm usually down low for strafing and try to avoid getting shot at. If I can get an easy shot I'll take it, but if I'm being shot at I usually try to get far away from that person as fast as possible.

Edited May 29, 2013 by OdinYggd
